comments.body: Should we print a status here that the task is in the process of stopping?
That shows up in the task state, which is STOPPING.  But the specific function here, `CoordinatorClient#prettyPrintTaskInfo`, doesn't print that.  So I think the test is OK.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@                    1246931159850L,
                    JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode()), ZoneOffset.UTC));
        assertEquals("Started 2009-07-07T01:45:59.85Z",
            CoordinatorClient.prettyPrintTaskInfo(
                new TaskStopping(new NoOpTaskSpec(1146931159850L, 9000),
